AAD.caption: File URL
AAD.doc: URL of file to retrieve base 64 from
AAD.name: fileurl

ABS.caption: Note: Bubble restricts string size to be less than 6Mb. Read the byte contents of any URL into a base 64 encode string. Returns a string of the base 64 encoded bytes. This is the equivalent of Bubble's :encoded in base64 operator but for any URL.
ABS.name: information
